creditline: The Winton Jones Endowment Fund for Prints and Drawings
description: man with long, curly hair, looking up to PR, with foreshortened facial features; PR hand on chest, PL hand holds a chalice by the foot; small book on table before figure; mountian landscape with swirling clouds in background; text at bottom:  \"IIII. / PASSUS SUB PONTIO PILATO, / CRUCIFIXUS, MORTUUS & SEPUL- / TUS.\"

title: Saint John, Plate 4 from the series Christ, the Twelve Apostles, and Saint Paul
